name: Smart Search Engine
description: This function takes a question as input and returns a comprehensive answer, along with the sources and statements used to generate the answer.
author: Shinkai

searchEngine.description: Search provider: google (default) or other supported engines. Affects API key requirements

searchEngineApiKey.description: Valid API key for chosen search engine. Required for non-default engines. Optional for Google

maxSources.description: Max sources to fetch and analyze (1-50). Higher values give better answers but take longer. Default: 10

question.description: Natural language question to research. Should be specific and clear for best results

response.description: Comprehensive answer synthesized from found sources. Includes citations and reasoning

sources.description: Array of reference sources with URLs and titles. Ordered by relevance to question

statements.description: Key facts and quotes extracted from sources, with relevance scores and source attribution
